physical_appearance:This is a set of eight lace strips. They are of varying lengths and design. They each feature a repeated scrolling pattern. Some are slightly stained.

subject_terms_2:Bobbin lace Motifs Exports

sgcool_label_text:There are 8 strips of lace of varying lengths and design. The making of bobbin lace was an established tradition in port cities like Malacca and Palembang by the early 20th century. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.

The making of bobbin lace was an established tradition in port cities like Malacca and Palembang by the early 20th century.
